reviewText: This is a BOC Mini-Mig Welder instructional video and there are better free mig welding instructional videos on You Tube that have a more general (non brand specific) application.  The video quality is also pretty ordinary.
maybe the most useless instructional video i have ever seen.  a total waste of money and time. well at least i laughed.

These are great. I had taken a welding class and my husband wanted to catch up on knowledge also so he could weld too. These are paced very well and I think one gets a really good lesson on welding with them.
